title: Docker image 0.4.0b8 ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'packaging'
body:
## Step 1: Have you search for this issue before posting it?

Yes, nobody has reported it yet.

## Step 2: Describe your environment
  * OS : Docker
  * Python Version: 3.8
 
## Step 3: Describe the problem:
**Describe the bug**
When starting the docker container for drakkarsoftware/octobot:0.4.0b8, the web interface never appears and python stack traces for import errors appear in the logs.

**Expected behavior**
Proper startup of application.

### Steps to reproduce:

  1. Run docker image drakkarsoftware/octobot:0.4.0b8
  

### Relevant code exceptions or logs:
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
 
```
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 975, in _find_and_load_unlocked
,  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 671, in _load_unlocked
,  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 783, in exec_module
,  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 219, in _call_with_frames_removed
,  File "/opt/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/OctoBot-0.4.0b8-py3.8-linux-x86_64.egg/octobot/cli.py", line 40, in <module>
,    import octobot.octobot as octobot_class
,  File "octobot.py", line 1, in init octobot.octobot
,  File "octobot_api.py", line 17, in init octobot.octobot_api
,  File "/opt/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/OctoBot-0.4.0b8-py3.8-linux-x86_64.egg/octobot/commands.py", line 32, in <module>
,    import octobot.api.strategy_optimizer as strategy_optimizer_api
,  File "/opt/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/OctoBot-0.4.0b8-py3.8-linux-x86_64.egg/octobot/api/__init__.py", line 19, in <module>
,    from octobot.api import updater
,  File "/opt/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/OctoBot-0.4.0b8-py3.8-linux-x86_64.egg/octobot/api/updater.py", line 17, in <module>
,    import octobot.updater.updater_factory as updater_factory
,  File "/opt/venv/lib/python3.8/site-packages/OctoBot-0.4.0b8-py3.8-linux-x86_64.egg/octobot/updater/__init__.py", line 17, in <module>
,    from octobot.updater import updater_factory
,  File "updater_factory.py", line 20, in init octobot.updater.updater_factory
,  File "binary_updater.py", line 1, in init octobot.updater.binary_updater
,  File "updater.py", line 16, in init octobot.updater.updater
,ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'packaging'
```

[octobot_logs.txt](https://github.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot/files/6285450/octobot_logs.txt)
